author: Special Correspondent
text:
Geelani in custody

A Delhi court on Tuesday sent former Delhi University lecturer S.A.R. Geelani to two days in police custody in a sedition case.

According to the police, Mr. Geelani was the convener of a function where a banner was put up showing Afzal Guru, who was convicted and executed in the Parliament attack case, as a martyr. Anti-national slogans were also allegedly raised at the event on February 10.
title: Sedition case
